title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
plunden joined #xwiki at 00:02  
SvenDowiu joined #xwiki at 00:34  
SvenDowideit left at 00:35 (Read error: 60 (Operation timed out)  
SvenDowiu is now known as SvenDowideit ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)

bbc581 left at 05:10 ("Cya L8r"  
CalebJamesDeLisl left at 07:35 (":]"  
xwiki-bridge - (12:01): \* joel has set the subject to: XWiki public chat  
bbc581 joined #xwiki at 12:54  
xipe\_ joined #xwiki at 16:26  
xipe left at 16:33 (Nick collision from services.  
xipe\_ is now known as xipe ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)  
xwiki-bridge - (16:35): [Vincent Massol] tmortagne: Hi. I haven't done a proposal yet but I've started working again on the new model interfaces. If you're curious or want to help out/comment you can check http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/contrib/sandbox/xwiki-model/  
xwiki-bridge - (16:35): [tmortagne] Vincent Massol: i'm currently commenting your committ ;)  
xwiki-bridge - (16:35): [Vincent Massol] :)  
xwiki-bridge - (16:36): [tmortagne] and i'm adding more general comment in the same mail  
xwiki-bridge - (16:36): [Vincent Massol] ok great  
xwiki-bridge - (16:37): [Vincent Massol] note that Server, current Wiki, current Space and current Document are put in the EC (when a XWiki URL is called)  
xwiki-bridge - (16:37): [tmortagne] Vincent Massol: sounds good  
xwiki-bridge - (16:47): [tmortagne] Vincent Massol: mail send, just some quick comments for now, i did not reviewed the full model yet  
xwiki-bridge - (16:47): [tmortagne] hope I will have some time next week  
bbc581 left at 17:24 (verne.freenode.net irc.freenode.net  
plunden left at 17:24 (verne.freenode.net irc.freenode.net  
plunden joined #xwiki at 17:38  
xwiki-bridge - (23:17): [NielsMayer] wow, i just had a major horkup importing 2.1xar into a root of a v-wiki (recovery technique: sudo service mysqld stop ; sudo tar xzvf ~/var-lib-mysql-12-10-09-before-xwiki-210-upgd.tgz var/lib/mysql/xwiki  ; sudo service mysqld start )  
xwiki-bridge - (23:19): [NielsMayer] it's because i decided i'd overwrite Xwiki.Wikipreferences and then fix em to get latest xar changes: 2009-12-12 11:25:24,172 [http://xwiki/xwiki/bin/import/XWiki/Import?editor=globaladmin&section=Import] WARN  xwiki.XWiki                     - Exception while getting wiki preference [backlinks]   
xwiki-bridge - (23:19): [NielsMayer] com.xpn.xwiki.XWikiException: Error number 3202 in 3: Exception while reading document XWiki.XWikiPreferences  
xwiki-bridge - (23:19): [NielsMayer] Wrapped Exception: a different object with the same identifier value was already associated with the session: [com.xpn.xwiki.doc.XWikiDocument#104408758]  
xwiki-bridge - (23:19): [NielsMayer] trying again skipping import of XWiki.XWikiPreferences  
xwiki-bridge - (23:20): [NielsMayer] just try to mess w/ me bugs! i haz backup!  
xwiki-bridge - (23:22): [NielsMayer] afterwards, i get some really enteraining error messages and can't access any admin fnality in root wiki .... "com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Access denied for user 'xwiki'@'127.0.0.1' to database 'Timeline.createBandInfo({   eventSource'"  
xwiki-bridge - (23:22): [NielsMayer] i never created a database "Timeline.createBandInfo"    ... that's a chunk of javascript from a JSX....
